product_name: Scott MTB Team Boa Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: The sleek, asymmetric men's Scott Team BOA Bike Shoes offer excellent response and slipperlike comfort for expert mountain bikers. Close-fitting, synthetic-leather uppers are supportive, comfortable and free of pressure points. BOA L5 reel at top and midfoot let you quickly dial in the cable lace for a perfect fit. Lower anatomic strap on the Scott MTB Team Boa Bike Shoes fine-tunes the fit. Removable insole features an adjustable arch support and metatarsal button. Low-profile outsole construction minimizes the distance to the pedal and maximizes your power output. Nylon-and-fiberglass sole is plenty stiff.
short_description: The sleek, asymmetric men's Scott Team BOA Bike Shoes offer excellent response and slipperlike comfort for expert mountain bikers.
